using System;
using System.IO;
using System.Text;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.TryCatch.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	public partial class ObjectCreation
	{
		public Task<MemoryStream> TestAsync(byte[] buffer)
		{
			var test = new MemoryStream(buffer);
			return Task.FromResult<MemoryStream>(test);
		}

		public Task<StringBuilder> Test2Async()
		{
			var test = new StringBuilder();
			return Task.FromResult<StringBuilder>(test);
		}

		public Task<StringBuilder> Test3Async()
		{
			var test = new StringBuilder{Length = 1};
			return Task.FromResult<StringBuilder>(test);
		}
	}
}
